title: mm的问题
author: dadasdasdfds
txt_content:
你们知道艾尔莉亚吗，就是那个rpg服务器
我想问的是想【如图】跳出的危险警告怎么做

【2】艾尔莉亚的boos出来都有一个半球体的火粒子怎么做
请回答者按这种方式解答:
Test1: 
  Mobtype: zombie 
  Display: '测试'
  Health: 30 
  Damage: 10
  Skills: 
  Equipment: 
  Drops: 
  Options: 
若成功50金立拿走不谢

replies.author: dadasdasdfds
replies.txt_content:
图片加载不出来，我告诉你们

 每次怪一出生，你就会看到
      危险警告
xxx出现在xxx

replies.author: 吊毛兽
replies.txt_content:
骷髅王特里:
  Type: ZOMBIE
  Display: '&e[50级]&f骷髅王特里'
  Disguise:
    Type: SKELETON
  Health: 13000
  Damage: 25
  DamageModifiers:
  - FIRE_TICK 0
  - FIRE 0
  Modules:
    ThreatTable: true
  Equipment:
  - 锁帽:4
  - 锁甲:3
  - 锁裤:2
  - 锁靴:1
  - 金剑:0
  KillMessages:
  - '&7[&b<target.name>&7]&6被&c尸王穆拉&6砍死了'
  Skills:
  - potion{type=FIRE_RESISTANCE;duration=200;level=4} @self ~onTimer:10
  - sendtitle{title="&c危险警告!";subtitle="&e骷髅王特里出现在魔塔镇附近!";d=200}
  - sendtitle{title="&a通告!";subtitle="&e骷髅王特里已被消灭!";d=200}
  - effect:particlebox{particle=flame;amount=200;radius=5}
  Options:
    AlwaysShowName: true
    KnockbackResistance: 1
    NoDamageTicks: 5
    MovementSpeed: 0.4
    FollowRange: 30
    MaxCombatDistance: 15
    PreventOtherDrops: true
  AIGoalSelectors:
  - 0 Clear
  - 1 meleeattack
  - 2 LookAtPlayers
  AITargetSelectors:
  - 0 Clear
  - 1 hurtbytarget
  - 2 players
  Drops:
